effect.red_blue: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.yellow: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

effect.blue_japan: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.red_blue: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.yellow: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.red_green_japan: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.blue_japan: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
